doc.title: First Ieat Overseas Volunteer cum Makan Trip!: Sandakan here we come!
doc.text: Thanks/JJ to/TO the/DT generous/JJ donations/NN from/IN our/JJ ieat/NN community/NN and/CC the/DT $/$ for/IN $/$ matching/CD from/IN MHCAsia/NNP ,/, we/PRP have/VBP managed/VBN to/TO raise/VB $/$ 22,125/CD for/IN the/DT ieat/JJ van/NN project/NN in/IN Sandakan/NN !/. So/RB we/PRP are/VBP planning/VBG our/PRP$ very/RB first/JJ Volunteer/NNP cum/NNP overseas/NNP Makan/NNP trip/NN !/. The/DT four/NN day/NN trip/NN will/MD be/VB from/IN Friday/NNP 17/NNP Sep/NN to/TO Monday/VB 20/CD Sep./NNS ./. The/DT second/NN half/NN of/IN the/DT trip/NN is/VBZ free/JJ and/CC easy/JJ but/CC our/JJ kakis/NNS are/VBP already/RB planning/VBG as/IN many/JJ meals/NNS as/IN they/PRP can/MD fit/VB into/IN the/DT schedule/NN ./.
